sentences.en: Fortune-telling is a very much debased art surrounded by superstition.
sentences.cn: 算命是一种非常低级的把戏，充满了迷信色彩。

sentences.en: Good fortune will follow you, both in this world and the next.
sentences.cn: 无论今世还是来生，好运都会伴随你。

sentences.en: He died in poverty in 1947, but his art is worth a fortune .
sentences.cn: 1947年他在贫困中死去，但是现在他的美术作品值大钱了。

sentences.en: He is certainly being smiled on by fortune.
sentences.cn: 现在他一定是得到了命运的垂青。

sentences.en: He made a fortune in real estate.
sentences.cn: 他在房地产上发了财。

sentences.en: He made a fortune selling property in Spain.
sentences.cn: 他在西班牙卖房产，发了大财。

sentences.en: He overreached himself and lost much of his fortune.
sentences.cn: 他的雄心太大，结果损失了自己大部分的财产。

sentences.en: Her personal fortune was estimated at £37 million.
sentences.cn: 她的个人财产估计有3,700万英镑。

sentences.en: How had he amassed his fortune?
sentences.cn: 他是如何积累财富的呢？

sentences.en: I felt it was useless to struggle against fortune.
sentences.cn: 我觉得跟命运抗争是徒劳的。

sentences.en: I had the good fortune to be selected.
sentences.cn: 我有幸被选中。

sentences.en: I had the good fortune to work with a brilliant head of department.
sentences.cn: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.en: I was expressing some amazement and wonder at her good fortune.
sentences.cn: 我对她的好运既惊奇又感叹。

sentences.en: It is quite easy to decorate your house without spending a fortune .
sentences.cn: 不花大钱装修房子也是很容易的。

sentences.en: Jane is determined to hold on to her fortune.
sentences.cn: 简决心要守住自己的财产。

sentences.en: My first painting sold for £25, a small fortune then for an art student.
sentences.cn: 我的第一幅画卖了25英镑，这在当时对一个学艺术的学生来说是一大笔钱。

sentences.en: She built up her fortune by cannily playing the stock market.
sentences.cn: 她炒股有方，发了大财。

sentences.en: Sickness or ill fortune could reduce you to a needy situation.
sentences.cn: 疾病或厄运会让你穷困潦倒。

sentences.en: The carpet must have cost a fortune .
sentences.cn: 这块地毯肯定花了不少钱吧。

sentences.en: The fortune will come to you.
sentences.cn: 这一大笔钱将归你所有。

sentences.en: We're not looking to make a fortune.
sentences.cn: 我们没打算大赚一笔。

sentences.en: When fortune smiled on him, he made the most of it.
sentences.cn: 当好运来临时，他充分把握住了。

sentences.en: You can indulge yourself without spending a fortune.
sentences.cn: 你不必花大把钱就可以好好犒劳一下自己。

sentences.en: You won't have to lay out a fortune for this dining table.
sentences.cn: 你不必为这张餐桌花一大笔钱。

sentences.en: You won't have to shell out a fortune for it.
sentences.cn: 你不必为它花一大笔钱。

phrases.tran_cn: 花大价钱；价格很高；值一大笔钱
寻找发迹的机会；寻出路

trans.tran_cn: 大笔的钱，时运，运气，命运
trans.tran_en: a very large amount of money
